headline: Construction Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) Market Analysis 2025 and Beyond, Featuring Profiles of Key Players - Oracle, Hilti, Autodesk, Trimble, Bentley Systems and More
summary: Key opportunities in the construction SaaS market include leveraging cloud technology for collaboration, the rise of smart cities, and sustainability demand. Growth is driven by digital transformation, integrated platforms, and mobile-first solutions, with focus areas in BIM integration and market expansion in Asia-Pacific.
